professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server administration, performance tuning, and data security.

Database Migration and bulk uploads
Ensuring SQL server patches are up-to-date
Troubleshooting performance issues and fine-tuning databases
24x7 production support for SQL databases and connection issues
Monitoring deadlocks and responding to queries causing blocks
Monitoring database performance
space utilization
and hardware check

Designing backup and recovery plans (RTO and RPO)
Administering data resources and ensuring high availability
integrity
and security
Planning and implementing capacity expansion for database scalability
Developing automated database applications using SSIS
Monitoring SQL Server health using Windows Performance Monitor
Working with Query Analyzer and Profiler to tune queries
Rebuilding indexes for better performance
Designing and implementing comprehensive backup and disaster recovery strategies
Installing SQL Server patches and upgrades
Assisting with application rollouts
server migrations
and maintenance
Solving user issues raised by the support team
Ensuring server security (user logins
roles
and antivirus checks)
Performing basic ETL processes using SSIS
Assisting in SQL Server 2005 to 2008 migration
